message: Document and implement the default workflow
Passing `--commit-changelog` to `release` now commits your curated changelog
Replace `--commit-changelog` with `--skip-changelog` for a single automated release
Update README to mention `nosetests` or `tox` requirement
Update README with current workflow example
Check for `changes` requirements and bail if they're not met
Use subshell to avoid changing directories
Update upload command docs to include wheels
Fixes for pull-request to support other README markups

Fix typographical error(s)

Changed conjuction to conjunction in README.
Update CI badges to reflect master
Fix typo in CLI option descriptions
Separate test environments and describe them
Update README and use as doc site index
Use mkdocs-click for cli reference docs
Move images to the root directory

Update continuous integration service configuration (#278)

* Update CI services

travis => github actions
pyup => dependabot

* circleci 2.1

* Cleanup Makefile targets

* Only build pushes to main and tags

* Build and publish docs to gh-pages

* Store test report artifacts to include in docs site

* Add CodeQL analysis

* Deploy pull request previews to Surge

* Improve workflow and job names as verbs

* Deploy to surge on main builds
